dict.string: Talking to another person about your problems, or listening to someone else’s problems for a while, can help improve your mood or change the way you think.
Talking to another person about your problems, or listening to someone else’s problems for a while, can help improve your mood or change the way you think.
Join a book club or reading group
Join a club to play a sport, such as bowling, basketball, or soccer.
Make a small gift for someone
